```{r loading packages, message=FALSE}
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggspatial)
library(ggthemes)
library(raster)
```

```{r loading datasets}
neighborhoods <- st_read("neighborhoods.kml")
parks <- st_read("recreation.kml")
playgrounds <- st_read("playgrounds.geojson")
```

```{r plotting multiple layers}
ggplot() +
  annotation_map_tile(zoomin = 0, progress = "none", type = "cartolight") +
  geom_sf(data = neighborhoods, color = "gray", alpha = 0.05, size = 0.5, aes(fill="Neighborhoods")) +
  geom_sf(data = parks, color = NA, alpha = 0.5, size = 0, aes(fill="Parks")) +
  geom_sf(data = playgrounds, shape = 16, aes(color = "Playgrounds")) +
  scale_color_manual(values = "darkviolet", name = "") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("gray","green"), name = "") +
  labs(caption = "Map generated by Noah Levine, map tiles by Stamen Design, and data by OpenStreetMap.") +
  theme_map()
```
